He needed money for college, for his car, for the new laptop, and for his stereo. This seemed like a dream come true: To participate in some experiment, and all he had to do, was write a daily blog. He would get four monthly payments totaling $ 20,000. He would get $5,000 per month! Not bad, for a summer job!

“Hold still, Sean….” Dr. Sanders said, as he injected the syringe in Sean’s arm. “This will sting for only a minute…”

A minute had passed. The doctor removed the syringe. The strange fluid had been injected in the boy’s bloodstream. The doctor placed a Band-Aid over the spot where the syringe had been injected.

“Here is the website, where you can go to start the blog…” the doctor said.

The nurse handed the student a folder containing a batch of papers containing instructions.

“If you have any questions, please call us.”

“So, what’s going to happen to me, now?” Sean asked the doctor.

“Let me explain…” the doctor replied.

1111111111111112.content:
Sean was happy to be back in his house, although it felt strange being more than a foot shorter than he was used to, standing only 4-foot-6. So, he got back in his room and wondered if he could perhaps get someone from school to call or come over and visit and perhaps say the word “grow” a few times, just to get him to grow back to his original height again?

Sean glanced through his list of contacts on his iPhone when he suddenly heard a knock on his front door.

“Oh, God. Who can that be, now?” Sean groaned, feeling a bit annoyed. He really didn’t want to have any people over, especially now that he was feeling a bit… shrunk.

So, he walked over to the door and opened. It was Mrs. Taylor again. She was standing there with a young boy next to her. He looked like he was about 12 years old.

“Sean, my nephew Reece just needs a place to hang out so he can do some homework and I’m having my carpet cleaned at my place. Do you mind it if he stays at your house? He’s a good boy and well-behaved. He’ll just sit at the desk and read a book!” Mrs. Taylor said.

“Oh, sure, come on in!” Sean smiled.

Sean opened the door further and the young boy walked in. The funny thing was, that the boy was the same height as Sean!

“Uhh… Hi!” Reece said shyly as he walked in and sat down in the chair at the kitchen table. He grabbed his book and started to read.

“Thank you, Sean. I’ll call you when we’re ready so you can send him home!” Mrs. Taylor said, before she turned around and left.

Sean was annoyed at first but pleased when he thought about it. He could ask Reece’s help in getting his height back!
“Hey, Reece? Can you help me out with something?” Sean said, as he walked up to the chair where Reece was sitting.

“Oh, sure, Mr. Sean. What do you need?” the friendly boy said, as he put his book down.

“I’m going to tell you something really cool, alright?” Sean began.

“Now, it doesn’t work when I say the words myself, but when others say it, my height will change by three inches every time somebody else speaks the words ‘shrink’ or ‘grow’ to me.” Sean explained to the boy.

Reece got off the chair and stood before him, giving him a curious glance.

“Uhh… What? Say what? Really?” the boy stuttered in disbelief.

“Yeah!” Sean assured the kid. “Just try it out.”

Reece just shrugged.

“Uhh… Shrink?” he mumbled.

Sean was hoping he would NOT pick that word, but he did, so he was going to shrink even further! He felt his body dwindling down even further now, as everything around him seemed to be growing by a few inches. His shoes got even bigger and his clothes became a bit looser. His t-shirt was now hanging way past his knees. Even his shorts had become far too big on him, reaching his shins. It took just a few moments for Sean to shrink to the point where he was now a few inches shorter than Reece, a 12-year-old boy himself. Sean now looked like a third- or a fourth-grader in elementary school, standing 4-foot-3 inches tall.

“Oh, great… “Sean sighed.

“Holy… frick…” Reece just gasped. “I can’t believe it. “You… You’re smaller! You weren’t kidding! Oh wow! I’m taller than you, now!”

“Look, Reece. I’ll play with you and hang out, okay? But… Please grow me back to my height, will you?” Sean pleaded with the boy.

“Okay, but… If I bring a Lego set, or some blocks tomorrow, can I make you smaller and play with you in my things? Please?” Reece asked him politely.

Sean just sighed.

“Sure, I’ll sit in your Lego things or your houses of blocks or whatever, as long as you grow me back!” Sean nodded.

“Yay! Okay! Grow! Grow! Grow! Grow! Grow! Grow! Grow!” Reece shouted.

Sean was overcome by a powerful tingling sensation! Suddenly, he was hit by a tremendous growth spurt! He was GROWING! He grew and grew and GREW… His body stretched out in every direction as he suddenly shot up to six-feet tall!

“YES! I’m back!” he cheered. “I’m normal again!”

“So… Let me get this straight…” Reece thought out loud. “I can make you shorter or taller just by saying shrink, shrink, shrink?”

Sean felt that tingling again!

“Whaaah!” he yelped as his body shrunk back down by 9 inches, down to 5-foot-3 inches.

“Ohhh…. This is… COOL!” Reece smiled. “This is very cool! Okay, Mr. Sean. Back you go! Grow, grow, grow!” the boy smiled.

“WHOAAAH!” Sean shouted, as his body shot back up again, back to 6 feet in height.

“This is so cool! So, what is the smallest you can become?” the kid asked him.

“Uhh… Three inches.”

“Oh! Action-figure-size! Awesome!” Reece cheered. “I’ll bring some toys for action figures tomorrow!”

“Okay… Just, don’t kill me, okay? I’m not a toy!” Sean replied, feeling worried.

“Don’t worry, Mr. Sean! I’ll take good care of you!” Reece giggled.

Sean was a bit relieved. Reece was a bit nicer than Cody. But still, he wasn’t sure he liked the idea of being played with like a toy…

There stood his friend, Brian. He had moved down the road a few years back and they'd become fast friends. Brian was shorter than Sean, standing somewhere near 5' 6", yet he had always been the more athletic one of the two.

"Hey man," Brian grinned, "you still up for that jog?"

Sean had completely forgotten about their planned run, he had enlisted his friend in helping get himself into shape for the summer and to form some good habits for when he went off to college in the fall.

"I totally forgot, but I'm up for it," said Sean, considering that a quick jog would not be overly dangerous in light of his shrinking situation and it would even probably tire him out enough to warrant a height-restoring nap in the early afternoon, tiding him over for the rest of the day. "Just lemme get ready."

Brian sat down and started working on the laces of his running sneakers while Sean retreated into his room, changing out of his daily clothes and into an ensemble suitable for running. Having been awake for around 40 minutes left him around 2 inches shorter than usual, so he tightened up his shoelaces and tied the elastic band of his running shorts extra tight, making sure to tuck in his shirt as well to add stability. He grabbed an old digital watch to allow him to keep track of the time. "Lets see," he thought, "an hour's run will get me back just before I lose enough height to make a scene."

Signaling to Brian on his way out, they left the house for their run.

They decided to run down Main Street, into the center of town and back, just over three miles.

Sean got into the groove quickly; the two friends had made a point to keep the talking to a minimum on their runs, accompanying each other wasn't a social activity, just a way to make sure that both of them kept up with the exercise they wanted. So the silence was broken when Sean's watch slipped off of his shrunken wrist and landed with a clink on the sidewalk. Sean stopped to pick it up as Brian stopped ahead of him, smiling at the slight misfortune that had befallen his friend. Sean picked up the watch and noted the time, 12:30. He was four inches shorter and considerably smaller than before. His shorts felt like they were sliding down lower than was comfortable; his shirt, shoes and boxers felt equally roomy. He hoped that Brian wouldn't notice as he walked ahead to catch up with him. As he get there, Brian turns and says:
131211.title: Sean's friend stops by

choices: "Hey, you were serious about the shrinking experiment weren't you?"
"Please tell me you're not wearing soccer socks with  berms"
1312111.content:
"Do I?" Sean quickly asked.

Sizing his friend up, Brian said "yeah, weren't you 6' tall? You're now barely taller than I am!"

Feeling panicky, Sean quickly blurted out that he was shrinking due to an experiment. Brian laughed and said "No way. Lets go back to your dorm for a shower and we'll go grab something to eat"

Sean hurriedly agreed. They made it back to Sean's dorm without incident. "Hmm, 1pm" Sean said, "How about you shower first, Brian?" "Fine by me"

Making sure Brian had entered the toilet before kicking off his oversized shoes, Sean instantly went to his computer and booted it up. He then had a thought -- "How would it be like for me to be only... 6 inches tall? Maybe I'll get Brian to stay over tonight to watch over my shrinking" With that, he made up his mind to shrink down to 6 inches tall today, or rather tomorrow.

Day 2 1.03pm
I've been awake for about 2 hours and 40 minutes -- shrunk around 8 inches already. My friend, Brian, is over today, so I'm hoping that i don't run into any trouble since I'm with him. Well, it's pretty much like yesterday for now, but I intend on staying awake and shrinking to 6 inches tall. As I type, I can feel my socks, which were almost til my knee, starting to fall around my shin. Will blog in a couple of hours or so. Oh wow, it's been 15 minutes already, and I've just lost another inch.

As Sean finished typing the last sentence, Brian came out of the shower.

Quickly closing the window with the blog, Sean pretended to be reading comics online. Turning around, he asked Brian while taking off his socks, "Hey dude , wanna stay over tonight? It's been boring ever since my roommate moved out." "Hmm... sure. I'll just have to go home and grab some stuff after lunch then." Brian answered.

As Brian was drying his hair, with his back facing Sean, Sean dashed for the toilet, for he was not sure whether Brian believed he was shrinking or not.

After Sean's shower, he realised that he'd lost yet another inch! 1:40, his watch read.

As he walked out of the toilet, he sat down on the bed and asked "So, where we going for lunch?" As he asked, Sean put on a pair of soccer socks. Standing up, he noticed Brian was considerably taller than he was. "Hmm, you have some food in the fridge so why not we cook lunch?" As Brian glanced at Sean, he continued,
1312111.title: "You look different..."

choices: Sean realised that Brian was staring at him in jealousy
Sean realised how smelly the socks he had been wearing were
13121112.content:
"Cooking lunch sounds fine and soccer socks are cool" Sean quipped

"Whatever, and you're shrinking aren't you" Brian questioned

"Yeah, told you just now didn't I?"

"Okay, whatever. Just checking" And with that, Brian proceeded to prepare lunch, while Sean just lolled around his bed watching television. 20 minutes later, Brian announced lunch was ready. After they had finished eating and clearing up, it was already 2:20, putting Sean to be about 5'3. His clothes felt larger, much like they've been yesterday. Brian sat next to Sean, inspecting him like he was weird for being 5' tall.

"Don't look at me like that! I may be smaller but I ain't a zoo animal"

"Fine... Hey I'll just go home to grab my stuff and come back over. I'll buy dinner over"

"Okay then, see you in 4 hours or so"

Rushing over to his computer after Brian left, Sean started typing

Day 2 2:25pm
Well, I'm now slightly over 5 feet tall and still shrinking. So Sean has agreed to stay over for the night -- He'll be back at around 6, which would put me at 4'4. Well, I should stop wearing soccer socks for it makes it even more obvious that I'm shrinking; the socks would just fall from my knees to my shin -- but i have no choice for i only have socks which are long. Well, i hope Brian doesn't mind me walking around wrapped in a towel. I'll blog again when i reach 2 feet tall, at around 3:20am

Sean kept himself busy and tried to fashion some clothes for when he shrunk to 6 inches tall using a pair of old socks. By the time he was done, it was already 6pm, and only just noticed the pair of scissors he was using was far too large for his tiny fingers. He heard a knock on the door and opened it, right after he wrapped himself up in a towel, wearing it was like a toga. It was Brian

"Woah, what happened to you man!?"

"I shrunk...?"

"Okay, whatever. I don't care. Lets eat"

Walking past a mirror, Sean realised how stupid he looked -- clad in a makeshift toga and socks bunched up at his shin. He looked like a young boy wearing his father's socks.

After dinner, Sean picked up vibes from Brian, like he was being treated like a kid. However, he decided to keep his mouth shut. So the duo watched television until about 11:20pm, when Sean was but 3 feet tall. Brian entertained himself by taking pictures of Sean being compared to normal stuff, like beds etcetc.

So in a flash, 3:20am came and Sean's makeshift toga was too big for him. All that he wore were his nike soccer socks. Deciding to just wrap both socks around himself, much like a toga as well, Brian snapped a picture of the end product -- Sean clad in socks.

"Hey dude, i have to go blog now -- but 1 problem. I'm too small!!"

"Then don't blog, we'll just watch tv"

"But I ha-" Sean never got to complete his sentence, for he was carried off by Brian onto the bed and watched television.

It wasn't until the end of the wheel of fortune marathan, which lasted from 3.30am to 7.30am, that Sean realised he was being engulfed by his socks. He glanced at the gigantic watch he was wearing on his jog yesterday -- 8am. He was now 6 inches tall! Sean signaled to Brian to get his 6 inch tall suit of clothes. hurriedly putting it on, with Brian taking pictures of a 6 inch (and still shrinking) Sean, he felt even.. smaller! Standing a millimeter or two shorter than 6 inches, Sean was a tiny boy, wearing clothes made out of old socks.

"Ahh, it feels good to be wearing actual clothes!"

It was then that..
13121112.title: "Please tell me you're not wearing socc...

choices: "Okay. Let's get some shuteye and start fresh later."
131211121.content:
Having reached the end of his dwindling odyssey, Sean felt it about time to get some sleep and restore himself to normality. One thing he didn't count on, however, was Brian's demeanor when Sean indicated that it was time to finish up the festivities for the day.

"What do you mean?" Brian asked. "We're finished?"

Sean was exhausted and wasn't really in any mood for debate on the issue: "Yeah man, I've gotta get to sleep and get myself back to normal if I want to get anything done today."

Brian looked disappointed, "But don't you want to see how small you can get? I mean, six inches is cool, but three or two would be cooler, right?"

Sean hesitated; he really didn't want to find out how much bigger this already monstrously huge world would be if he was half or less of his current size, though with every minute, he was creeping towards that inevitability.

"Not today. I'm beat and I'm done. We can mess around with this a bit more later today, when I'm bigger and rested."
Brian stopped for a second, stood up, shooting into the clouds and said:
131211121.title: Sean realised that Brian was staring at him in ...

choices: I made it under the door to safety
Brian caught & forced me to drink the energy drink
1312111211.content:
I said, "I'm done for today. I have to get some sleep. I am so tired. I don't have much energy left to stay up any longer. Besides if I get much shorter I won't have any thing to wear at all. I am going to sleep now."
Brian stood up as tall as possible to look really intimidating as possible (it was working considering I was craning my neck so far back it was beginning to hurt just so I could look him in the eye) & stared down at me. He was so tall now his head seemed to be up in the clouds. His face seemed to be a little blurry. He replied in a condescending, demeaning & demanding tone, "There is not a chance your going to go to sleep until you are only an inch tall. I know how to keep you awake until then. Besides it's not like you can do anything to stop me from keeping you awake. I've always been stronger than you but now I'm in complete control!"
As he said said this he flexed his mighty pecs, arms & abs causing his t-shirt to strain to contain his large muscular upper body. He then said, "I'll be right back Don't go any where." Brian then walked out of the room. I gulped hard as I realized Brian was right. Brian had always been the stronger one. Even through he was six inches shorter than me normally, Brian was built solid as a rock from years of wrestling, football & weight lifting. Brian could do what ever he wanted to me now. I decided I had to hide from him.
I ran across the desk to my phone laying on the desk & stradled the charger cord like a fireman on a fireman's pole. I then slid down the cord to the floor like a fireman wood slide down the pole in a fire house. I then started running across the floor to my storage room where I knew I could sleep till I returned to normal. I figured I was now small enough to slip under the door considering I had just lost two more inches bringing me down to four inches tall. My make shift clothes were giving me trouble so I just discarded them leaving myself in the nude as I ran towards the storage room. Brian would be unable to unlock the door considering he didn't have the code to unlock the door.
Just as I was nearly to the storage room door, Brian walked back in & said, "where do you think your going you little pipsqueak?" Brian started walking directly for me as I tried to run even faster for the storage room. The closer Brian got to me, the more the floor seemed to shake as each step he took created earthquakes. i just needed a few more seconds & I would be safe. However time was not on my side. I looked back & saw he was rapidly gaining on me with his long legs. In his hand he was carrying an eight inch tall can of the most powerful energy drink available. When I was normal sized it would make me super hyper & alert for hours. If he forced me to drink it at only four inches tall theres no telling what it would do to me now?
1312111211.title: "Not a chance"

13121112112.content:
Once Brian caught up with me and my little legs, he grabbed me from the ground and held me against the energy drink, forcing me to ingest half of the entire can which was two times my size now.

As I slurped down the drink, my tiny body was exploding with energy. I felt like I could run a marathon in 20 minutes easily. I knew exactly what this meant however. No sleep. No growing back to normal size for a very long time, and that’s exactly what Bran wanted. I thought about how small I would shrink. Would I just dissappear? No, I don’t want to think about that right now


“See? that wasn’t so bad” Brian said, “now let’s see what this shrinking can really do”. I tried to wriggle out of his grasp, but his muscles tightened around my frail body and immobilized me. He started towards my room and sat me down on my desk with my computer and soda, both even more massive then they were last night. “Now we wait” Brian said, unable to hide his excitement with his sadistic grin.

At this point I was very worried. Me and Brian had been friends for forever, and our friendship never seemed like it could be challenged. But this, this was just wrong, and I knew it. I had to do something. Just at that moment, a thought occurred to me. I could call for help with Brian’s phone sitting on the desk. At 3 inches tall now, my weight should be enough to activate the keypad, but not for long. I had to make the decision now. But doing something that big came with the risk of being caught by an evidently unstable Brian. “Should I risk it” I thought to myself, “or will I regret it later?”
13121112112.title: Brian caught & forced me to drink the energy drink

choices: To take a shower, get dressed, and do a little shopping
To skip the shower and see what Brian wanted to do
1312111212.content:
"It's a plan."

Sean heaved a sigh of relief at the oddly tense situation and felt that he had avoided something unpleasant that might have happened. He resolved to stay in control, notably to keep himself big enough to stay in control later on.

"So, when you go to sleep, do you shoot up automatically or does it happen slowly?"

Sean didn't rightly know. This had happened only once and he was clearly asleep for it. Possessing no evidence either way, Sean spoke up: "I really don't know. You want to take the camera and film it as it happens?"

Brian brightened a bit at that and agreed readily. He lifted Sean gingerly and placed him on his titanic bed. Sean tried his best to get comfortable while Brian set up the camera to record Sean's growth throughout the night. Sean wasn't long for consciousness and quickly fell asleep. He woke up in an odd position, but was most certainly his original size again. He looked over at Brian, who was dozing on a chair near the bed and then scanned the room over to his clock, which read "1:30pm" on the block lettered face.

"It's good to be back," he said quietly.

Brian, who had been sleeping quite lightly, perked up at this and said, "Welcome back to the real world. You were out real quick."

Sean yawned and nodded at this. Remembering their experiment, he asked, "What happened with the pictures? Did I grow fast or slow?"

Brian: "It wasn't really fast, but it's enough to show on the video. I took video and a few still shots while I was still awake. Here, lemme show you." He plucked the camera off its tripod and tossed it to Sean. Thumbing through the controls, he found the video but the screen was too small to see anything clearly. He was halfway out of bed before he realized that he had gone to bed wearing a sock-outfit for a six inch person and was waking up wearing nothing at all. He quickly sat back down and gathered up the blanked, looking over to Brian and asking him for some clothes from the floor.

Brian obliged by throwing over the running shorts that Sean had worn the day before. He had some trouble sliding them on before he realized that they were tied to fit his shrunken frame from earlier the day before. Thus clothed, he strode over to the computer and connected the camera. The photos and videos began to upload as Sean swiveled around to Brian.

"You wanna grab us something to eat? I'm starving."

"Sure. You want the usual from down the street?"

"Yep. Take some cash here."

Thus equipped, Brian headed down to the deli while Sean tapped out his necessary blog entry, chronicling his descent. He noticed that his favorite parts were in the beginning of the process, while he was still big enough to simply be mistaken for a smaller person. Once he dipped below 4', however, he began to feel less and less human, beyond feeling like a kid or something like that. He couldn't quite explain it, but he did his best.

It turns out that his best took around 10 minutes, which was also the time it took to finish uploading the photos and videos from earlier. Hitting submit, he clicked over to the newly created folder and leafed through the pictures.

The experience was a weird one, to say the least. Brian's pictures started with Sean at around four and a half feet tall. Pictures of Sean next to the couch, on the couch, next to the TV, reaching for something on his desk, tripping over his overlarge clothing. Then, the timer shots of Sean and Brian back to back, making flexing poses, with Brian carrying Sean and so on. The shrinkage wasn't noticeable from shot to shot, but taken as a whole, his condition was clear.

Finally, he clicked over to the video as Brian arrived with breakfast. Brian brought over their food, pulled up a chair and Sean opened the video. The video itself was a full 5 hours long, so Sean upped the speed and hit play. There, was a shot of his bed. They ate as they watched Sean's tiny head, just visible over the fold of a blanket. After a few brief tosses and turns, the head settled down and began to get bigger. After 25 minutes of unaltered video-time had elapsed, Sean was clearly visible on the screen, perhaps around two feet tall. As the video quickly progressed, he saw himself go from tiny to small, small to undersized and undersized to normal, all in the span of around an hour and a half of footage time. That hour and a half had elapsed in around 15 minutes.

"Wow... I missed the end part, cuz I fell asleep. That's almost as cool as you getting smaller."

Sean responded, "yeah... almost."

Having eaten and sat for a little while, Sean realized that he had been awake for nearly 45 minutes and had already lost two inches from the moment he had awoken. If he wanted to get anything done today, he would have to pick up the pace.

Standing up, Sean decided:
1312111212.title: "Okay. Let's get some shuteye and start...

choices: "Let's walk the ten minutes to the Goodwill Store"
"Let's take the bus, a half-hour ride, to the mall"
13121112121.content:
"I'm going to take a quick shower and buy some differently-sized clothes. You have anything to do later?"

Brian nodded, "I'm going out with some other friends at around 5:30, but I'm free until that... sure, I'll take a trip out for a bit"

Sean responded, "Okay, did you want to jump in the shower?"

Brian thought and said, "Sure. Do you mind if I go first?"

Gesturing, Sean said, "Be my guest; towels are under the sink."

Brian headed into the bathroom for what Sean hoped would be a quick shower. He was already down to 5'10". Sean definitely wanted to get out of the house while he was big enough to wear his own clothes with a degree of comfort. While Brian showered, Sean took a look through a box of older clothes that could be useful in his dwindling state. He found a pair of jeans that he had recently put aside for being too small in the waist. Putting them on the bed, he also found a t-shirt that had been washed too many times and had shrunk a bit, as well as some pairs of older underwear and socks. Trying them on, the pants and shirt were just a tad too small, which worked fine for Sean's purposes. He demurred on trying on the small underwear, which he resolved to give a try after his shower.

Having his daytime wear laid out thusly, for lack of anything better to do, Sean set to the computer and started typing up a blog entry to talk about his morning so far. Brian emerged from the bathroom, mostly dressed at 2:35. Glancing at the clock, Sean knew he was down to around 5'9" and would need to shower quickly if his new wardrobe was going to last for an appreciable amount of time outside his dorm room.

Grabbing his new clothes from the bed and a towel from the rack, Sean headed into the bathroom and closed the door. He took a few minutes of the solitude to look himself over; since he had begun his daily shrinkage, he hadn't really gotten a handle on how he changed every hour. He felt the same as he always did and because he had only lost three inches to this point, he generally looked the same as he always did, but careful examination yielded undeniable clues that he truly was littler than before. The sink was slightly higher on his waist; his face took up less of the bathroom mirror; the head of the toothbrush felt bigger in his mouth. He did some poses, as he usually did. It wasn't overtly visible, but he was definitely a smaller teen than he had been before. It took some getting used to.

He jumped into the shower, adjusted the nozzle, and took as fast a shower as was practical. Getting out, he saw the clock at 2:48 and knew that he had lost an inch since his last self-measurement. He dried himself off- the towel felt bigger- and went to try on his new-old underwear. The pair was truly old, and it took a little tugging to get them up, but they fit- albeit fairly tightly. The jeans fit over those and the shirt went on. While nothing was too tight to wear, everything was just slightly too small. Sean, however, felt that the outfit didn't look as uncomfortable as it felt, and decided not to switch anything out. He would shrink into the outfit soon enough. Throwing his dirty clothes into the hamper, he stepped out of the bathroom.

Brian turned and laughed, "Well, you look like quite the hipster." Sean smiled, "I guess I do." He then grabbed a pair of beat up sneakers, slid on his socks, rolled up his jeans, and tied the shoes tightly. Standing up, he noticed that his height advantage over Brian was much diminished, though his current 5' 7.5" still gave him the advantage.

"So, Sean- where do you want to go?"
13121112121.title: To take a shower, get dressed, and do a little ...

131211121211.content:
Sean thought about it for a moment. "I don't really want to spend a lot of money on new clothes, so let's hit the Goodwill!"

It was only a ten minute walk, but Brian insisted on stopping at a food truck along the way for a taco.

"Want one?" his friend asked him.

Sean thought about it. His stomach grumbled to remind him they hadn't eaten before leaving the dorm, so he accepted. Brian placed the order, paid the bill, and took the two tacos.

Sean dug into his. Bite after bite went into his mouth, but it seemed like each one took longer to chew. Guess that's what happens when I'm getting smaller. It didn't help that Brian forgot to order drinks to wash the food down with. When he was finished, Sean noticed his belly stuck out a little further than he was used to after only one taco. He also remarked at how much fuller he felt.

"Ready to go," Brian chirped, oblivious to his friend's observations.

"It's only right there," Sean laughed as he pointed to the store just a couple doors away.

When they walked through the door, Sean noticed the clock over the register announcing the time at 3:00pm. 5'6". Exactly the same as his friend, but that was quickly changing.

Sean shook off the awareness and gazed across the sales floor. One sign indicated shirts to the right, another indicated pants at the back of the store.

"Where do you want to start?" Brian asked him.
131211121211.title: "Let's walk the ten minutes to the Good...

1312111212111.content:
"Shirts," Sean told him enthusiastically, so they headed toward the right to check out the racks.

Sean's eyes scanned the markers dividing the shirts by size. He already had plenty of larges, and he knew they would work as his body dwindled downward through sizes medium and small. It was the smaller sizes he needed, something for when the neck hole of his larges seemed big enough for his whole body to slip through. The Children's sizes!

His hands reached into the largest sizes, passing by shirt after shirt of standard, plain colors. There was nothing too childish, nothing too embarrassing for him to consider, it was simply the colors that left him thinking. Do I want red? How about blue? Sean was uncertain about selecting kid's clothes when he walked in, but seeing his selection, his confidence was up.

Then Brian approached him carrying something that looked like toddler's size.

"How about this one!" his friend beamed. It was a little blue shirt with a large yellow star on it. The star had a cartoonish smile on it, and the caption beneath proclaimed the wearer of the shirt to be "Daddy's #1 Star."

Sean had to admit to a bit of humor, imagining himself wearing that when he was down to about 2 feet or so. He was about to give Brian an emphatic "yes," when a devilish idea popped into his head.

"No way! I am not going to wear that," Sean announced.

Brian smirked and pulled the little shirt tight against his chest as if Sean might snatch it away and put it back on the rack. "Too bad! I'm buying it anyway, and I will make you wear it."

As Brian turned back to see what other goofy shirts hid among the infant sizes, Sean collected a few good-looking children's large, smugly congratulating himself on tricking his friend into buying some of the clothes for him.

Unconsciously, Sean reached for his belt and tugged his pants up. Time was slipping away and so was his height. I should hurry this up. He looked at the shirts draped over his arm and decided to...
1312111212111.title: Shirts?

13121112121111.content:
It wasn't like Sean was terribly shy. If the shirts he and Brian already had weren't enough, he was comfortable hanging out in his room without one. It was pants he needed.

Sean crossed to the back of the store, and gazed at the racks of pants. The first thing he noticed was how high the racks looked. He didn't notice when he shopped shirts, but the tops of the racks were now reaching the top of his chest! Brian followed behind him, and when Sean turned around, he found his eyes level with his friend's nose.

Sean looked around, wondering if the other customers had noticed his shrinking. Everyone seemed to be focused on their own shopping, but Sean couldn't shake the feeling they were gawking at him in secret.

"What do you think you'll need?" Brian asked, pulling Sean out of his daze.

"Huh?"

"Pants aren't shirts," Brian pointed out. "You can't just pick the length you want, you also have to think about the inseam!"

"Of course!" Even though he grew 6 inches in high school, his waist remained a constant 28". During his shrinking, that 28" shrunk with everything else. He figured it was safer to err on the side of too big since he could always tighten a loose waist with a belt, but then he would need an appropriately small belt. "This whole clothing thing is more complicated than I thought," he told his friend.

"Naw," Brain said, reaching for a pair of 22-24s. "If the waist fits before they're long enough, they'll just be shorts or capris!"

"Ha ha!" Sean said, rolling his eyes at the thought of looking not just like a little kid, but a girl as well!

Sean's shoe almost fell off when he moved toward the section for even smaller sizes, and he realized he had to hurry. Like Brian, he began to pull random jeans of different sizes from the rack. The pile of shirts, and now the jeans grew heavier and heavier. Maybe I should have gotten a cart. But it didn't take long before he figured he had enough to get him through a day.

"You getting some undies to go with those pants?" Brian asked him.

"No way! I'll buy shirts and pants here, but I'm not buying my underwear second hand!"

Brian laughed at his disgust, while Sean thought about his next move.
13121112121111.title: Shop for pants

131211121211111.content:
The collar of Sean's shirt slipped down his shoulder, and he knew it was time to check out and get home. With his finds in hand, Sean approached the register and waited as the heavy-set woman on the other side slowly folded his clothes and placed them in a bag as she added the prices into her register. Every few seconds, her eyes glanced up from her work at the curiously dressed teen.

The clock behind her read 4:10, telling Sean he was down to 5'4". He must have looked small next to Brian, and the tags in the clothes only told the check-out lady the story of what was to come. The process was slow and agonizing, but eventually, she announced the total. Sean paid, but then had to wait while Brian made the special purchase he was conned into. By the time they finally walked out, another half inch was gone.

The walk home was uneventful. Brain took out his phone and checked his text messages. "Looks like we're going to the movies," he announced. "Wanna come with us, Sean?"

The dwindling teen thought as he entered the dorm and headed for the stairs. The theater would be dark, so no one would notice his size disappearing in the two hours or so the movie ran. On the other hand, he wasn't sure if he wanted a whole crowd staring at him like a little kid when the film let out. He considered it while changing into a pair of smaller pants and his boy's large tee-shirt. He was now 5'2.5" and the shirt fit. It was a little tight, but there was no problem fitting it over his slim torso. By the time the movie was scheduled to start, he would be 3 inches shorter, and that shirt wouldn't be so tight.

"So what do you say, Sean?" Brian had to go if he was to meet his friends, and Sean needed to give his answer.

"I think..."
131211121211111.title: Check out

1312111212111112.content:
"...I'll sit this one out," Sean told his friend. "I still have a blog entry to write."

"Whatever," Brian told him. "Can I come back later and see you in your new wardrobe?"

"Of course," he answered excitedly. With that, he watched Brian step out to leave him with his thoughts.

Sean went right to his desk and sat while his computer powered on. While he waited, he noticed how he sat on the edge of his seat...how his knees bent downward so his feet would reach the floor. Funny! At 6', my knees are bumping the bottom of the desk! At 5'2", his forearms bent awkwardly upward so his hands could reach over to the keyboard. When he was ready to start typing, he had to pay close attention to where his fingers went as the keys weren't where he was used to them being with his normally larger hands. He wasn't even that small yet, and everything felt so expansive. Not as expansive as it felt in the previous days at smaller sizes, but Sean was still not used to the sensation of the world expanding around him.

All of it went into his blog for the doctor's perusal. Sean was caught up with reliving the experience in the thrift shop, the minutes passed unnoticed. Then 10 minutes. Then 20. The keys spread slowly apart. His mouse flowed outward from the palm of his hand. Sean had to raise his elbows to keep typing, and his knees dropped further downward to keep his feet planted on the floor.

He passed the 5 foot mark about the time he wrapped up his blog. 4'9" came and went while he surfed the web. It was only another inch before his stomach grumbled for food. The little clock on his screen read 6:50! Too much time had passed since the taco Brian bought him, and his stomach punished him for it. The only question was what to do for supper? He had an urge to order a pizza, but Sean didn't know if he wanted to face the delivery guy when he hit 4 and a half feet. His kitchen was stocked, but he didn't know if he could fix something easily enough at his reduced size. What to do! What to do!

13121112121111121.content:
Sean picked up his smartphone to order the pizza. It was so much bigger, "almost like a tablet", he thought. It wasn't quite that big...yet, but it sure felt like it! He hit 4 on the speed dial for a little pizza place on the corner. He was going to order a small figuring it would be enough at his child-like size, but when he remembered Brian coming back, he thought it would be nice to have the leftovers for later.

20 minutes later, and the delivery guy knocked on his door. "One large with olives and pepperoni for Sean Roberts," he called from outside.

Sean slipped from his chair and noticed his child's large tee-shirt, which was a little on the tight side earlier, now felt a little oversized. His jeans nearly slipped down his butt toward the floor. Sean tightened his belt.

"Looks like it's almost time for the next pair!"

He fetched his wallet, and removed a $20 bill, then headed for the door. His hand reached out for the doorknob, nearly striking the blank panel before he realized it was higher up than he remembered. Second time was the charm, and he brought open the door.

The delivery guy's jaw dropped when he saw what looked like a 10-year old with a day's worth of scruff on his face. Sean tried to act cool as he handed over the bill and took the pizza. "Keep the change," he told the guy in a voice that was a little higher pitched, but still odd for a "10-year old."

"Uh...thanks," the guy said, turning to leave, stealing one last glance before Sean shut the door.

The teen chuckled at the sight he must have presented while he brought the pizza to his couch. He sat down and put the TV on, bringing up his favorite streaming service. "I don't need to leave home to see a movie," he announced aloud. "I've got hundreds at my fingertips!" He then opened the pizza box and grabbed one of the oversized slices of pizza. "Not to mention I can't eat this in the theater!"

He selected some cheesy creature flick while munching on the slice. With the reduced size of his stomach, it was full with just the one slice. Sean glanced to the rest of the pizza, remembering when he used to eat half of a large in a sitting.

It wasn't just the pizza that seem gigantic all of a sudden. Sean leaned back and felt like he was being swallowed in his own couch. By the time the movie was over, he was down to an even 4 feet tall! When he climbed down and stood next to the couch, the top of the cushions were above his waist!

Sean grabbed the rest of the pizza to take it to the kitchen, and almost dropped it. The thing was so much heavier than it was when he paid for it! Even with a slice missing, it was almost a struggle. It took him a moment to get used to its new weight before he carried it into the kitchen. And no sooner did he get in there than a knock came to his door.

"That must be Brian." he said. Sean didn't want to put the pizza in the fridge in case his friend wanted a slice, so he went to the table, now chest high to his diminished body. He had to hoist the box up to set it on the top before he could race out to answer the second, impatient knock calling to him.

"I'm coming," he shouted as he reached the door. The knob seemed so much higher than before, now resting just higher than the table top was to him! It took a little more effort to twist it. When he got his front door opened, Sean stood there, taking in the massive figure standing before him.

Who was Sean looking at?

Brian smiled down at Sean in amazement, and Sean had to look way up to catch his eyes. The top of his head didn't quite reach the bottom of Brian's chest. Sean had to remind himself that his friend was "only" 5'6"!

You're not wearing the shirt I got you! The bigger teen boomed.

Sean chuckled, thinking about that silly cartoon star. "Didn't have time to change," he said, adjusting his pants once again. The belt was already tightened to the final hole, so Sean was stuck holding them up. "There's pizza in the kitchen, if you want some while I change."

info.brief_description: A high school student named Sean participates in an experiment where he slowly shrinks.
info.description:
This is the story of Sean Roberts, an 18 year-old high school senior who just started his last year in school. He really wanted to get a job to save up for college and for a new computer, but he couldn't find anything due to the bad economy in his town. Then, one day, he saw an ad in the local newspaper, about a scientific experiment which was taking place at the lab at the university. Candidates were being screened, and they were looking for a particular type of person. Sean went to the office and filled out several forms containing questions about his health. Since Sean had never had any illnesses, he passed all the tests with flying colors.

Sean was one of the top three candidates for the experiment. Finally, Sean was picked because of his length and height and his age. The professor, who was leading the project, was looking for a student, who would go online and write a blog about his experiences from the first day on forward.

The story starts in the lab where Sean meets Dr. Sanders. The doctor tells him that this experiment would mean that Sean would experience moment of size changes, where he would shrink and then grow back to his original size again, after a certain period of time. Sean always returns to his original height of 6 feet.

Sean can only shrink in small increments (between a few inches and one foot) and he can't become any smaller than one inch in height.

He would only remain small for a short period of time before growing back, so that he could blog about his experience. He would also tell his friends (or his girlfriend) about it.
